title: Miles2006
author: Miles2006
content: In a modern world where technology has been dominating in all aspect, new inventions and new technology. Creating of robots in all aspect, marketing sector, agro sector, etc. So in the cryptocurrency space people use robot to predict the Price, gambling and trading of bitcoin. the human brain is made up of billions of nervous tissue, and it can accumulate and store thousands of information. On the other hand robots has a stuck brain, that has been programme for a particular purpose, a robot cannot do further thinking. Robots cannot take the place of humans when it comes to prediction and future telling because robot has a stuck brain and can't think of what will happen in the future and if it does, it will give that particular answer all the time. robots are been programme and it cannot think and act on his own, so robots are still controlled under human intelligency. In a situation of comparison, man is a creative being. humans have the ability to think, the human brain has the ability to think and make multi decisions. And cannot be compared to robots in essence robots cannot think beyond the purpose and programing. making use of robots to predict the price, gamble and trading of bitcoin can affect the feature generation, making the generation lazy in thinking aspect.Conclusion: therefore using robot to predict, gamble, and trading is not a good idea, because the disappointment will be a great damage.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: From what I have observed, I can tell that it's only crypto newbies or traders who are being deceived into believing that they can earn more by relying on trading bots. There's even a new trend now where scammers are deceiving new traders and disappearing with their money. What the scammers do is make the newbie believe that trading bots are using AI, which is much smarter than human knowledge in terms of trading. They will ask the newbie to give them money to purchase the bot, use it for trading, and generate profit for them. Some people have really fallen into this scam in my place, while some people too have done things on their own, and they end up blowing their accounts still with the bot bull shit.
